snippet.title: Rogue vs Evil roguelike: demo of start of first level
snippet.description:
Hello ladies and gentleman, this is the first ever video of my upcoming pixelart roguelike Rogue vs Evil: https://hgames.itch.io/rogue-vs-evil It shows the start of the game, starting from the world map and entering the first dungeon.

The full game will be released on June 4th 2019, for Windows, Linux, Mac and in web browsers.
